timeline.bodyText: The URI.create may thrown only IllegalArgumentException exception, could you please use it instead of generic Exception? Thank you.
timeline.author: reta

replies.bodyText: I can do that, but the way that the code is currently implemented, the only caller is looking for a MalformedURLException if there is any problem in this method, and the request chain gets nuked if any other exception is thrown which is kinda catastrophic.  Was thinking that any exception from this method should raise the MalformedURLException so the caller just returns false. Future proofing.  If you still want the specific exception caught I can edit and resubmit.
